00069 void ElemTriangle::initialize( std::vector<Node*> & nodes_in )
00070 {
00071 //   cout << "CellTriang points " << this->points << endl;
00072 
00073   // This function can be joined with assembleGaussPoints so the Gpoints are iterated only once...
00074   int i=0;
00075   for ( std::vector<GaussPoint*>::iterator it = gPoints.begin();
00076         it != gPoints.end();
00077         ++it)
00078   {
00079     for( i=0; i<3; ++i )
00080     (*it)->addSupportNode( threeNodes[i] );
00081   }
00082 }
